page.title: 08BRILL DAIRY AND ARABLE FARMS
page.content: There are 13 farms in our area,8 of which are working farms.They are Park Pale,Coldharbour,Brillbury Hall,Middle, Spa,Lawn,Tramway and Muswell Hill farms.There are 2 arable and 5 sheep farms.The sheep supply meat and wool and the cows supply milk,meat and leather.The 6 dairy farms include Park Pale Farm which supplies Brill and local villages with milk.Park Pale Farm has 140 milking cows which are milked twice a day.Cows calve mainly between July and December and also in January, February,March and April.Milk is bottled by B and M Dairies Park Pale produces between 1,000 and 2,400 litres of milk per day.Farm equipment includes silage and hay making machinery, handling and corn machinery.
